overview: For the past couple years, I’ve been a CSA with Delta Air Lines. It has been a tremendous journey working for Delta and I enjoyed every bit of it. Now my team and I are working towards a new beginning with Cloudfinity. Something that we couldnt have imagined for months ago, its worth a shot to share what we believe would be an easier way to access your files in the cloud! So why not, lets Unify our cloud storage accounts into a single virtual storage! Take a look at our project! Cloudfinity!
